id_table_1.caption: TABLE I: Comparing ARKitFace with other 3D Face datasets. Exp. and Vert. are abbreviations of the annotation number of categories of expressions and number of vertices for 3D mesh, respectively.
table:
Dataset Sub. Num Image Num 3D Mesh Num Exp. Num camera Vert. Num 6DoF Pose
Bosphorus[39] 105 4,666 4,666 35 Mega 35K No
BFM [40] 200 synthetic 200 Neutral ABW-3D 50K No
FaceWarehouse [41] 150 3000 3DMM 20 Kinect v1 20K No
MICC[42] 53 53 203 ≤\leq 5 3DMD 40K No
3DFAW[43] 26 26 26 Neutral DI3D 20K No
BP4D[44] 41 328 328 8 3DMD 70k No
AFLW2000-3D[9] 2,000 2,000 3DMM - - 53,149 No
BIWI[19] 20 15,678 24 Neutral Kinect 6,918 Yes
NoW[20] 100 2,054 100 Neutral iPhone X 58,668 No

ARKitFace 500 902,724 902,724 33 iPhone 11 1,220 Yes
